title: Mountain Entry
tagline: in which the Fellowship discovers a hidden path
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship decides to search the mountains for a secret entrance to the dwarf outpost.
They follow a series of marked stones with descending numbers which leads them to a gorge with an 'enter' rune.
Leaving their horses behind, they navigate a tunnel that leads to an underground waterway and a secret door.
They encounter Inakara and her kind and are coerced into battling a roper in the old trading hall.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship uncovers a secret mountain passage and combats a roper as they meet Inakara and her group in the outpost.
